## Data Wrangling using dplyr

The nycflights13 package contains five datasets on all 336,776 flights that departed from New York City in 2013.

```{r cars}
library(tidyverse)
library(nycflights13)
flights
#dplyr's basic verbs are filter(), select(), arrange(), mutate(), summarise(), and group_by()
flights %>%
  filter(month %in% c(1, 2))
```
